prompt:
What are some ways you can help prevent the spread of infectious diseases like Covid-19?
Covid-19 is a highly contagious respiratory illness that primarily spreads through close contact with infected individuals or touching surfaces recently contaminated with the virus. To reduce the risk of transmission, it's important to practice good hygiene and maintain social distance from others when possible. Additionally, wearing masks in public spaces where maintaining six feet apart isn’t always practical can help mitigate spread as well.
